p: Results: We enrolled 82 patients, who averaged 62 years of age, 53% were female. 43% were admitted to medical, 39% to surgical, 17% to neurologic ICUs. Mortality rate was 13%. SOFA, APACHE II, SAPS II results summarized in Table 51. Comparison of scores by t-test showed significant increase in illness severity between ED arrival and end of first 24 hours in ICU (Table 52).
